requirements.jd_requirement: Professional working experience with modern frontend technologies (React, TypeScript)
requirements.evidence: Built internal security tooling using React.js for operator-facing interfaces; experienced in full-stack development with JavaScript/TypeScript

requirements.jd_requirement: Professional working experience with modern backend technologies (Ruby on Rails, Node)
requirements.evidence: Used Node.js in internal tooling and API development; experienced with JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystems

requirements.jd_requirement: Professional working experience with relational databases (Postgres, schema design, query tuning, migrations, understanding of transactions and isolation)
requirements.evidence: Built multi-source data ingestion and reconciliation pipelines requiring deep understanding of relational schema design, query optimization, and transactional integrity

requirements.jd_requirement: Ability to contribute to a feature's development from start to finish, including asking questions to clarify requirements, working across disciplines, participating in solution scoping, and implementing changes in your area
requirements.evidence: Owned end-to-end delivery of security automation systems across engineering and security teams; translated ambiguous requirements into deployable controls

requirements.jd_requirement: Strong focus on problem-solving, coupled with the judgment to seek assistance or ask questions effectively and at the right time
requirements.evidence: Built pragmatic, production-grade security tooling by iteratively clarifying operational problems and escalating appropriately when dependencies or constraints emerged

requirements.jd_requirement: Demonstrated ability to learn and grow based on mentorship, realtime feedback, and past experiences
requirements.evidence: Continuously evolved internal tooling based on operator feedback and incident learnings; shipped iterative improvements grounded in real-world use cases

requirements.jd_requirement: Be comfortable participating in an on-call rotation (or similar incident response process) for the services you own
requirements.evidence: Built and operated production security services with runbooks, alerting, and on-call readiness; emphasized reliability-first design

requirements.jd_requirement: Integrate AI tools (such as Claude, GitHub Copilot, and Gemini) into every aspect of your work, including new feature development, incident response, and investigations
requirements.evidence: Built AI-augmented security workflows using LangChain and RAG pipelines with strong governance and auditability; applied AI to incident triage and investigation

requirements.jd_requirement: Follow and promote accessibility (WCAG aware UI), testing (unit/integration/e2e), CI/CD, and participate in code reviews
requirements.evidence: Integrated WCAG compliance checks into CI pipelines and built automated test suites for internal tools; practiced CI/CD with GitHub Actions/GitLab CI

requirements.jd_requirement: Build for international audiences: i18n/l10n pipelines, time-zone correctness, and data residency considerations
requirements.evidence: Designed infrastructure and data pipelines with region-aware configurations using Terraform/Ansible; applied data residency controls in cloud deployments

requirements.jd_requirement: Instrument services with logs/metrics/traces (Observe or similar) and contribute to incident ready observability
requirements.evidence: Built observability into security services using Grafana, Prometheus, and structured logging; designed incident-ready runbooks and dashboards

tone_notes: Match Instructure’s mission-driven, inclusive tone—emphasize impact on educators/learners, collaboration across disciplines, and continuous learning. Highlight ownership, reliability, and user-centered design rather than just technical depth.
summary_angle: Position Conner as a security-aware full-stack engineer who builds reliable, accessible systems end-to-end—with strong emphasis on automation, observability, and AI-augmented operations—aligned with Instructure’s mission to empower educators and learners globally.
